afternoon.

was placed on the intersection between four

Subject_2: Aligning neutron beam on MAPMT /w SoNDe module
Text_2:
We are aligning the neutron beam on the MAPMT

Subject: Gamma measurement of Float Glass, full neutron beam
Text:
Full beam on Float glass. Two gamma detectors
placed according to photo. Slits are completely
open.

to photo. Slits

the Borofloat glass and right after the measurements
were started.
